name: Romance Character Creator
prompt: Create an original urban romance protagonist character for use in a novel.
PEX:
Create an urban romance protagonist character for use in a novel.
Name: Marie Hill
Gender: Female
Age: 26
History:
Marie Hill was young, single, and ready to mingle after a horrible breakup. Her playful and loving personality had been suppressed for ages, however, as her ex never appreciated her openness. She struggles to open herself back up while her age and desire to settle down with a family is pushing her to do so. The problem? She can't seem to find anyone worthy of her attention. Maybe the upcoming office party will give her the opportunity to finally talk to the cute security guard that has been flirty with her from the start?'

##
